a Random Poem i wrote for my english ISU

The broken hearts...
She watched as her newly named ex-boyfriend walked by two days after she had ended them. Remaining as normal was difficult when he was also her best friend. She wonders why she is the one with a broken heart when she was the one to end the madness. Day in and day out, seeing him walk by was killing her inside. Slowly as the weeks passed by of the feelings not changing she began allowing her grades to drop and she wasn't hanging around or talking to her friends. In the end it all came clear... Her broken heart was eating at her, slowly as she began to hurt herself more and more, caring less about what people thought and more about how to end it all, and she did.

===============================================================

He looked longingly at her as he passed her in the hall. But what she couldn't see in him was that her pain was feeding his and healing it as he moved on. Eventually, he knew it would happen again but this time he wouldn't cry, and the truth was he never cared about her at all, until he had found out what he had cause her to do.

But it was too late, the deed was done. She was dead.

anotherrrr poem

Looking out my window
As the tears run down my face
I wonder what it would be like to live in a real world
But I don't live in a real world I live in the depths of hell
I hear a sound
My mind wonders what it could be
I see a shadow
I start to tremble
Tears won't help me
I pray to god
I ask him why
Kill the beast, It's come again
I live in a world of dreams
As the blood drips down my hands
I feel no pain
At last the nightmares will go away
The darkness will be no more
What i have done this day will surely send me to the abyss of hell
But what is life when all you see and all you hear and all you feel is the closing of the walls around you
I'm sure death will be a better place then this place in hell i called a home
